description: A React component implementing a minimalistic dashboard application with navigation, theme toggling, form handling, and a mock authentication UI.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Switches between light and dark themes.

methods.name: handleNav
methods.description: Handles navigation between different pages (dashboard, form, auth).

methods.name: handleFormChange
methods.description: Updates form state based on user input.

methods.name: handleFormSubmit
methods.description: Validates and submits the form, showing success or error message.

methods.name: handleAuthSubmit
methods.description: Validates the auth form and displays a message (no backend integration).

methods.name: TopNav
methods.description: Navigation header component with theme toggle and navigation buttons.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: Sidebar navigation component with page selection buttons.

methods.name: Dashboard
methods.description: Main dashboard page displaying informational cards.

methods.name: FormPage
methods.description: Sample form with name and email inputs, handles submission.

methods.name: AuthPage
methods.description: UI for login/signup, purely for UI demonstration.
